author: m.kalinin
content: I am thinking we're leaving `v2` as is and start following this proposal https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/issues/376#issuecomment-1547720683 since `v3`

author: g11tech
content: lodestar's validation of incoming request's count was w.r.t. max blobs sidecars, but it made our serving of the api only more forgiving and hence shouldn't have been issue in devnet

content: to send request, we only use the slot count
